alert.note: Alert for Central Horry; Coastal Georgetown; Coastal Horry; Florence; Inland Georgetown; Marion; Northern Horry; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 2:44PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A line of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Florence, Georgetown, Horry, Marion and Williamsburg Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 241 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong thunderstorms from near Timmonsville to Indiantown and Trio southward. This line was moving toward the east at 35 to 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down weak trees, tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Florence, Myrtle Beach, Conway, Georgetown, Marion, Lake City, DeBordieu Colony, Mullins, Surfside Beach, Pawleys Island, Myrtle Beach Airport, Yawkey South Island, Murrells Inlet, Winyah Bay Entrance, Socastee, Red Hill, Springmaid Pier, Garden City, Horry, and Andrews. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Seek shelter indoors prior to the arrival of this line of storms.

area.areaDesc: Central Horry; Coastal Georgetown; Coastal Horry; Florence; Inland Georgetown; Marion; Northern Horry; Williamsburg
